sentences.en: Cindy told him with pseudo sweetness.
sentences.cn: 辛迪装出一种甜甜蜜蜜的口吻对他说.

sentences.en: He rubbed his cheek with pseudo ruefulness.
sentences.cn: 他露出假装悔恨的表情摸摸自己的脸颊.

sentences.en: Her care for the poor is completely pseudo.
sentences.cn: 她对穷人的关心完全是假的.

sentences.en: In the limit of read-mostly applications this can rise to nearly 100% giving a dynamic system with pseudo static performance.
sentences.cn: 在一个基本上只读的应用中，如果给动态系统以假的静态性能，这个数字几乎可以达到100%。

sentences.en: Kaolin forms pseudo - hexagonal plates, often regularly arranged in book - like or vermicular stacks.
sentences.cn: 高岭石呈假六边形片体, 往往以书页 状 或蠕虫状规则排列.

sentences.en: One very important feature of pseudo forces is that they are always proportional to the masses.
sentences.cn: 赝力的一非常重要的特征是,它们永远与质量成正比.

sentences.en: Paper 1 discusses some basic Properties of switching operation of pseudo hypergraph.
sentences.cn: 文献[1]讨论了伪超图开关类运算的基本性质.

sentences.en: Polls have become the quintessential pseudo - events of the preprimary campaign.
sentences.cn: 民意调查已经成了初选选战最典型的假事件.

sentences.en: Pseudo - non - mainstream ~ stop so I do not know called line.
sentences.cn: 伪 非 主流~别再这么不知所谓行么.实在是没法再看下去.

sentences.en: Pseudo code is a combination of computer command and ordinary languages.
sentences.cn: 伪代码是一组日常语文及电脑指令的结合.

sentences.en: The new designs utilize over - moded cavities and also exhibit pseudo - elliptic transfer functions.
sentences.cn: 这种利用多模腔的设计也具有准椭圆传输函数特性.

sentences.en: There are double agents, and there are pseudo - double agents.
sentences.cn: 有双重的密探, 还有假的双重密探.

sentences.en: This apparent interest of his in modern music is completely pseudo.
sentences.cn: 他对现代音乐显露出的雅兴纯属自欺欺人.

sentences.en: This study also suggested that Araucaria cunninghamii might be called pseudo - winged seed.
sentences.cn: 本研究提出肯氏南洋杉为似具翅种子.

sentences.en: What a load of pompous, pseudo-intellectual rot.
sentences.cn: 真是自命不凡的伪知识分子的一派胡言！

sentences.en: Who on earth is all this money for psycho - babbling pseudo - therapy?
sentences.cn: 他们会问:“到底是谁在花钱接受这种含糊不清的、假心理治疗? ”
